requirements: Nursing degree equivalent to UK Bachelor's

implementationSteps.title: English Language Test
implementationSteps.description: Take IELTS Academic test achieving 7.0 overall with minimum 6.5 in each section

implementationSteps.title: Document Verification
implementationSteps.description: Get nursing qualification and license verified by NMC approved verification agency

implementationSteps.title: NMC Application
implementationSteps.description: Submit online application to Nursing and Midwifery Council with all required documents

implementationSteps.title: Test of Competence
implementationSteps.description: Complete Computer Based Test (CBT) and Objective Structured Clinical Examination (OSCE)

implementationSteps.title: Registration
implementationSteps.description: Final NMC registration upon successful completion of all requirements

challenges.solution: Book OSCE slots as early as possible, consider multiple test centers
Use NMC-approved agencies and submit documents well in advance

requirements: Bachelor's degree in nursing or equivalent

implementationSteps.title: English Language Test
implementationSteps.description: Achieve IELTS 7.0 in all four components or equivalent OET scores

implementationSteps.title: Skills Assessment
implementationSteps.description: Apply to ANMAC for nursing qualification assessment and evidence portfolio

implementationSteps.title: Document Preparation
implementationSteps.description: Prepare comprehensive evidence portfolio including work experience and references

implementationSteps.title: AHPRA Registration
implementationSteps.description: Apply for nursing registration with Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency

implementationSteps.title: Final Assessment
implementationSteps.description: Complete any additional requirements or bridging programs if needed

challenges.solution: Consider OET as alternative to IELTS, practice extensively before testing
Use professional migration agents familiar with ANMAC requirements

NewZealand.jobMarket: Growing demand, especially in rural areas

implementationSteps.title: English Language Test
implementationSteps.description: Take IELTS Academic achieving 7.0 overall with minimum 6.5 in each section

implementationSteps.title: NCNZ Application
implementationSteps.description: Submit application to Nursing Council of New Zealand with academic transcripts

implementationSteps.title: Competency Assessment
implementationSteps.description: Complete CAP assessment including written examination and practical assessment

implementationSteps.title: Police Checks
implementationSteps.description: Obtain police clearance from all countries lived in for 12+ months

implementationSteps.title: Registration
implementationSteps.description: Final registration with practicing certificate upon successful completion

challenges.solution: Register for CAP as soon as eligible, plan around available test dates
Start police check process early, use apostille services for authentication

implementationSteps.title: English Language Test
implementationSteps.description: Take IELTS General or Academic achieving required provincial minimums

implementationSteps.title: Credential Assessment
implementationSteps.description: Get nursing education assessed by provincial regulatory body

implementationSteps.title: NCLEX-RN Preparation
implementationSteps.description: Study for and pass the NCLEX-RN examination

implementationSteps.title: Provincial Application
implementationSteps.description: Apply to specific provincial nursing regulatory body

implementationSteps.title: Final Registration
implementationSteps.description: Complete any additional provincial requirements and obtain license

challenges.solution: Research specific provincial requirements early, choose province strategically
Use comprehensive study materials, consider prep courses, practice extensively

implementationSteps.title: English Language Test
implementationSteps.description: Take TOEFL iBT (83+) or IELTS (6.5+) depending on state requirements

implementationSteps.title: CGFNS Evaluation
implementationSteps.description: Complete credentials evaluation through CGFNS or equivalent approved agency

implementationSteps.title: State Application
implementationSteps.description: Apply to state board of nursing for eligibility to take NCLEX-RN

implementationSteps.title: NCLEX-RN Examination
implementationSteps.description: Study for and pass the NCLEX-RN examination

implementationSteps.title: Visa Process
implementationSteps.description: Complete immigration process including VisaScreen certificate

challenges.solution: Work with immigration attorney, start visa process early
Research target state requirements thoroughly, consider multiple state options
